abstract: Prominent Indian human rights activist Irom Chanu Sharmila announces she will end 15-year hunger strike in order to contest elections; Sharmila has been public face of efforts to end Armed Forces Special Powers Act of 1958, which shields Indian armed forces from prosecution.

headline.print_headline: Indian Activist Says She Will End a 15-Year Hunger Strike
headline.main: Indian Activist Says She Will End 15-Year Hunger Strike

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Irom Chanu Sharmila, who has been the face of the fight against a law shielding the armed forces from prosecution, said she would end her fast and join politics....
lead_paragraph: Irom Chanu Sharmila, who has been the face of the fight against a law shielding the armed forces from prosecution, said she would end her fast and join politics.
